name: NSParagraphStyle.LineBreakStrategy
desc: Constants that specify how the text system breaks lines while laying out paragraphs.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a line-break strategy with the specified raw value.

items.name: static var hangulWordPriority: NSParagraphStyle.LineBreakStrategy
items.desc: The text system prohibits breaking between Hangul characters.

items.name: static var pushOut: NSParagraphStyle.LineBreakStrategy
items.desc: The text system pushes out individual lines to avoid an orphan word on the last line of the paragraph.

items.name: static var standard: NSParagraphStyle.LineBreakStrategy
items.desc: The text system uses the same configuration of line-break strategies that it uses for standard UI labels.
